a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Open defecation in rural areas vs. urban areas, 2020
Open defecation refers defecating in the open, such as in fields, forest, bushes, open bodies of water, on
beaches, in other open spaces or disposed of with solid waste.
Data source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme (JMP) for Water Supply and Sanitation
